full_summary:
## Fire Alarm Project – Regina, SK
### Solicitation Number: M5000-22-2375/A

#### Background:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to procure fire alarm system upgrades for 13 buildings in Regina, Saskatchewan. The scope of work includes removing and replacing existing fire alarm panels, installing demarcation, transmitter, and wiring to the communication room, and completing the work by August 31, 2023.

#### Procurement Approach:
This is a two-phase competition. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of bidders based on mandatory requirements outlined in the Request for Qualifications (RFQ). The second phase will invite pre-qualified bidders to submit financial bids for the project based on the specifications and drawings. The procurement will be conducted under the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

#### Key Dates:

* Submission deadline: March 15, 2023, at 4:00 PM (MDT)
* Tender documents may be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders

#### Conditions of Contract:
The RCMP is committed to providing a safe and secure environment for its personnel. Bidders must conduct their business in accordance with security requirements outlined in the RFQ.

#### Miscellaneous:
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource that allows Indigenous businesses to promote their capacity and services. Having a profile in the IBD may increase business opportunities and competitiveness in government procurement.
* The RCMP encourages bidders to familiarize themselves with the official languages of Canada, English and French.
* Bidders are required to submit their proposals in the official language of their choice.

### Contact Information:

For any questions or concerns, please contact the following:

* Name: Sandra Robinson
* Title: Procurement Specialist
* Email: [sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 780-670-8626
